text: I looked on when the Lamb opened one of the seven seals, and I heard one of the four living creatures saying with a thunderous voice, “Come!”
So I looked, and here came a white horse! The one who rode it had a bow, and he was given a crown, and as a conqueror he rode out to conquer.
Then when the Lamb opened the second seal, I heard the second living creature saying, “Come!”
And another horse, fiery red, came out, and the one who rode it was granted permission to take peace from the earth so that people would butcher one another, and he was given a huge sword.
Then when the Lamb opened the third seal I heard the third living creature saying, “Come!” So I looked, and here came a black horse! The one who rode it had a balance scale in his hand.

Then I heard something like a voice from among the four living creatures saying, “A quart of wheat will cost a day’s pay, and three quarts of barley will cost a day’s pay. But do not damage the olive oil and the wine!”
Then when the Lamb opened the fourth seal I heard the voice of the fourth living creature saying, “Come!”

So I looked and here came a pale green horse! The name of the one who rode it was Death, and Hades followed right behind. They were given authority over a fourth of the earth, to kill its population with the sword, famine, and disease, and by the wild animals of the earth.
Now when the Lamb opened the fifth seal, I saw under the altar the souls of those who had been violently killed because of the word of God and because of the testimony they had given.

They<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2896">cried out</st> with a <st data-num="3173" class="">loud</st> <st data-num="5456" class="">voice</st>,<n id="2" /> “<st data-num="2193">How</st> <st data-num="4219">long</st>,<n id="3" /> <st data-num="1203">Sovereign Master</st>,<n id="4" /> <st data-num="40" class="">holy</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="228" class="">true</st>, before you <st data-num="2919" class="">judge</st> those who <st data-num="2730" class="">live</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="1093" class="">earth</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1556" class="">avenge</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">our</st> <st data-num="129" class="">blood</st>?”

Each of them was given a long white robe, and they were told to rest for a little longer, until the full number was reached of both their fellow servants and their brothers who were going to be killed just as they had been.
Then I looked when the Lamb opened the sixth seal, and a huge earthquake took place; the sun became as black as sackcloth made of hair, and the full moon became blood red;

<st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="792" class="">stars</st> in the <st data-num="3772" class="">sky</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="4098" class="">fell</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="1093" class="">earth</st> <st data-num="5613" class="">like</st> a <st data-num="4808">fig tree</st> <st data-num="906" class="">dropping</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="846" class="">its</st> <st data-num="3653" class="">unripe figs</st><n id="3" /> when <st data-num="4579" class="">shaken</st> <st data-num="5259" class="">by</st> a <st data-num="3173" class="">fierce</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="417" class="">wind</st>.

The <st data-num="3772" class="">sky</st><n id="1" /> was <st data-num="673">split apart</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="5613" class="">like</st> a <st data-num="975" class="">scroll</st> being <st data-num="1667">rolled up</st>,<n id="3" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">every</st> <st data-num="3735" class="">mountain</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3520" class="">island</st> was <st data-num="2795" class="">moved</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> <st data-num="846" class="">its</st> <st data-num="5117" class="">place</st>.

<st data-num="2532" class="">Then</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="935" class="">kings</st> of the <st data-num="1093" class="">earth</st>, the<n id="2" /> <st data-num="3175">very important people</st>, the <st data-num="5506" class="">generals</st>,<n id="3" /> the <st data-num="4145" class="">rich</st>, the <st data-num="2478" class="">powerful</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">everyone</st>, <st data-num="1401" class="">slave</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1658" class="">free</st>, <st data-num="2928" class="">hid</st> <st data-num="1438" class="">themselves</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="4693" class="">caves</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">among</st> the <st data-num="4073" class="">rocks</st> of the <st data-num="3735" class="">mountains</st>.

They<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st> to the <st data-num="3735" class="">mountains</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> to the <st data-num="4073" class="">rocks</st>, “<st data-num="4098">Fall</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">on</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2928" class="">hide</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="4383" class="">face</st> of the one who is <st data-num="2521" class="">seated</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="2362" class="">throne</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="3709" class="">wrath</st> of the <st data-num="721" class="">Lamb</st>,<n id="2" />
because the great day of their wrath has come, and who is able to withstand it?”
